snippet: The British government denied visas to the Farnborough show for some state and state company officials including those in the military aviation industry, citing the conflict in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The British government denied visas to the Farnborough show for some state and state company officials including those in the military aviation industry, citing the conflict in Ukraine.

headline.main: Britain’s Denial of Some Visas to Russians for Air Show Stirs Outcry
